channel.title: Troubleshooting on IBM CloudPak for Watson AIOps Training - Installation and Configuration
channel.description: Recent content in Troubleshooting on IBM CloudPak for Watson AIOps Training - Installation and Configuration

item.title: General Troubleshooting
item.description: General Troubleshooting Official Troubleshooting Documentation The official IBM Troubleshooting Documentation is probably a safe place to start. Check your installation Run the following tool: ./tools/11_check_install.sh This might give you some pointers as to why your instance is misbehaving.

item.title: Installation Problems
item.description: Installation Problems Topology Pods in Crashloop If the aiops-topology-xxx Pods are crashlooping, apply the following patches. I have only seen this happen on ROKS. oc patch deployment aiops-topology-merge -n cp4waiops --patch-file "./ansible/roles/cp4waiops-ai-manager//templates/waiops/patches/aiops-topology-merge-patch.yaml" oc patch deployment aiops-topology-search -n cp4waiops --patch-file "./ansible/roles/cp4waiops-ai-manager//templates/waiops/patches/aiops-topology-search-patch.yaml" oc patch deployment aiops-topology-status -n cp4waiops --patch-file "./ansible/roles/cp4waiops-ai-manager//templates/waiops/patches/aiops-topology-status-patch.yaml" oc patch deployment aiops-topology-layout -n cp4waiops --patch-file "./ansible/roles/cp4waiops-ai-manager//templates/waiops/patches/aiops-topology-layout-patch.yaml" Pods with Pull Error If Pods are having pull errors, apply the following patches.

item.title: Integration Problems
item.description: Integration Problems Slack integration not working See here Check if data is flowing Check Log injection with Browser Go to DemoUI Select tab System Select Flink Connectors Click on ELKInception3 You should see values go up under Records Sent when launching incident creation Check Log injection with CommandLine To check if logs are being injected through the demo script: Launch ./tools/22_monitor_kafka.sh Select option 5 You should see data coming in.
